title: disconnected mid-game, internet still works
body: It keeps saying connection error..I got disconnected mid-game...wtf riot..youtube/fb still working so its on your end

replies.body: Nope, you can still have issues reaching specific services even though your internet is fine.  In this case, your network is probably having issues reaching the game server, and disconnecting you.  My suggestion would be to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide and troubleshoot.  Make sure to do it in a custom so you don't get a leaverbuster.  Let me know if you have any questions.
